org.ardenus

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigListener

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigListener
    The main game class that is used to store and initialize everything.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • setResourcePack

        public final ResourcePack setResourcePack(ResourcePack resourcePack,
                                          int priority)
        Sets a resource pack with the specified priority. If another resource pack has the priority already, it will be replaced. The priority of resource packs goes from highest to lowest. This means that if a resource is present in two resource packs the resource pack with the higher priority will have its resource used rather than the one with the lower priority.
        Parameters:
        resourcePack - the resource pack.
        priority - the priority.
        Returns:
        the previous resource pack with the specified priority, null if there was none.

      • setResourcePack

        public final void setResourcePack(ResourcePack resourcePack)
        Sets the game's primary resource pack.
        Parameters:
        resourcePack - the resource pack.

      • getResource

        Parameters:

        Returns:
